name: RPGGAME
description: RPGGAME how to play 1: double click game.exe 2: setting graphics and click play 3: click the 'LAUNCH' Multiple time 4: enjoy the game key setting MOUSE LEFT: MOVE MOUSE LEFT: ATTACK graphic setting fantastic-high speed-low about this game Very Awesome and fun RPG Game WOLF IS DEFALT ENEMY AND DRAGON IS MAIN BOSS I HOPE YOU GUYS ENJOY...
